message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it will greatly enhance your experience and satisfaction. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $100 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you highlighting the quality of the product.  However, $100 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $85 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to come up with a solution that works for both of us. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $90. I hope this proposal is more suitable for your current financial situation.
